configuration.dependency.title: Dependent components
configuration.dependency.failedToGetVers: Failed to get information of new version
configuration.thirdParty.title: Third Party Configurations
configuration.functional.title: Functional configurations
configuration.contact.title: Contact us
configuration.appInfo.title: System information
configuration.appInfo.autoUpdateFails: Auto-Update Fails? Click to download complete installers
configuration.appInfo.tip.appDataPath: This is where core data files stored and DO NOT change them if not necessary. The logs in [System] - [Logs] are saved in bootstrap_log.* files, they can be safely deleted.
configuration.appInfo.tip.dataPath: This is where user files, covers, and other data are stored.
configuration.appInfo.tip.tempFilesPath: This is a directory where temporary files are stored.
configuration.appInfo.tip.logPath: Detailed information which describing the running states of app. You can send log files to developer if the app is not running normally, and you can delete them also if everything is ok.
configuration.appInfo.tip.backupPath: A data backup will be created when using the new version of app first time, you can delete them if everything is ok. You can download the corresponding version of the app and use the backup files to overwrite the App Data Path for data recovery.
configuration.others.title: Other settings
configuration.others.proxy.tip: You can set a proxy for network requests, such as socks5://127.0.0.1:18888
configuration.others.enablePreRelease.ti: Prefer pre-release version which has new features but less stability
configuration.others.enableTracking.tip: We are using Microsoft Clarity to track anonymous data, which will help us to improve our product experience.
configuration.others.maxParallelism.tip: Maximum degree of parallelism for CPU-intensive operations. Set to 1 to disable parallelism. Leave empty for default (half of CPU cores).
configuration.development.title: Development
configuration.development.tip.configurab: The configurable port range is {{min}}-{{max}}. And you can set it to 0 for auto count.
configuration.development.tip.changesAft: Changes will take effect after restarting the application
configuration.development.tip.portWarnin: Please be careful when setting this value, if you set it to a value that is already in use by another application, our application will not be able to start.
configuration.development.tip.portsInput: Enter ports separated by commas, e.g. 34567, 34568
configuration.development.error.tooManyP: Too many ports. Up to {{max}} ports are supported.
